name: Jumping Bird (Snowline Development)
description:
Play as a little bird and try to avoid obstacles to get as far as you can! The game is an endless runner with high score. To jump, click Left Mouse Button / Press Space if you are using mouse or keyboard, or tap on your screen if you are using a phone or a tablet. Try and get the highest score possible!

The game supports following languages: Arabic, Chinese, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish and Turkish.
